thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 22 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Prismaflex International: 9M Sales Increase To 39.8 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Prismaflex International: 9M Sales Increase To 39.8 Million Euros
text:
Jan 22 (Reuters) - PRISMAFLEX INTERNATIONAL SA:
* 9-M SALES FIGURES, UP 14.6% (+15% AT CONSTANT CURRENCIES)
* ON DECEMBER 31, 2017, ORDER BACKLOG, MAINLY FOR HARDWARE, IS HIGH AT €14.75 MILLION ‍​
* ORDER BACKLOG CONFIRMS THE POSITIVE FORECASTS FOR THE FULL PERIOD‍​
* 9-M SALES FIGURES AT EUR 39.8 MILLION * TO ENABLE ACQUISITION OF ANTHEM DISPLAYS COMPANY PLANS ON CAPITAL INCREASE (LESS THAN 10% OF EXISTING CAPITAL) AND BANK DEBT TO FINANCE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
